article_text: Just 10 days since formally announcing he’ll run for president in 2016, Texas Republican Sen. Ted Cruz made a campaign stop in Rock Hill, kicking off a weekend trip around South Carolina that includes events in the Upstate, Columbia, and Charleston.

article_metadata.news-keywords: Ted Cruz, campaign, presidential campaign, GOP, tea party, South Carolina
article_metadata.description: Just 10 days since formally announcing he’ll run for president in 2016, Texas Republican Sen. Ted Cruz made a campaign stop in Rock Hill, kicking off a weekend trip around South Carolina that includes events in the Upstate, Columbia, and Charleston.
article_metadata.title: Presidential hopeful Ted Cruz visits Rock Hill, talks nuclear deal, IRS (+ video) | The State
